name: WGT Golf: Long Drive Bundle
summary:
Packed with power and value, this bundle is designed to take you farther off the tee - as you may have guessed! The best part is players at all levels will benefit from these premium upgrades.

The Long Drive Bundle includes:

- Titleist TS2 Driver (L0+): Your drive sets the tone for each hole, so make them count with this popular upgrade improving your overall distance and forgiveness
- 6x Titleist Pro V1x Ultra Slow Meter Vapor Balls (L0+): These top performing golf balls slow down the swing meter to help you hit more accurately and consistently, plus the added vapor trail makes each shot easier to track
- 2,000 WGT Credits: Visit the Pro Shop to find more equipment upgrades to pair with the above, and fresh new apparel items for your golfer
- 100,000 Coins: Test your skills in multiplayer games or rent special clubs in the Pro Shop
- 5x Platinum Apparel Packs: Give your golfer its own style with unique apparel items, including hats, shirts, gloves, pants and shoes, that will improve both their performance and appearance
- Immediately unlock all courses
